snippet: In August, the New York Hilton Midtown will discontinue food and drink service to all 2,000 rooms. In its place will be a self-service kitchen stocked with grab-and-go items.
abstract: New York Hilton Midtown plans to discontinue room service in August, replacing it with self-service kitchen stocked with grab-and-go items; some industry experts see elimination of the labor-intensive amenity as way for chain to save money.
lead_paragraph: In August, the New York Hilton Midtown will discontinue food and drink service to all 2,000 rooms. In its place will be a self-service kitchen stocked with grab-and-go items.

headline.seo: Room Service Is Vanishing From a Big Hotel
headline.main: Sorry, Eloise. No More Room Service.
headline.print_headline: Sorry, Eloise. Sorry, Bond. One Big Hotel Is Putting an End to Room Service.
